TopicTitle: 2D animation I did for an intro class

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I took a Principles of 2D Animation this quarter at Art Institute, and for my final I chose to use a Kerbal as my character. I am pretty happy with how it turned out, and I thought I'd share it with you all.

This is entirely hand drawn, then digitized with a DSLR and combined into separate animated movies in Monkey Jam, then composited in Premiere Pro. It's 300+ drawings and took me probably more than 40 hours of work in all.

Anyway, I hope you enjoy it. Thanks for looking! And thanks Squad for the inspiration!
Greate.! Respect.. *-* My Gif's are nothing compared to your animation.. ^^
Oh TheFighter I know you just want attention! Don't lie! They're just as good.
Nono.. it took 40 h to draw that.! TerranCmdr`s animation needed looots of patience and effort, much more than mine.. He really has my respect.!
